LanguageData.VME_GrotesqueOrgy.stages.0.label: grotesque orgy
LanguageData.VME_GrotesqueOrgy.stages.0.description: When you think of an orgy, you tend to imagine attractive people. This was... the entire opposite. The mental images will take a while to go away.
LanguageData.VME_AwkwardOrgy.stages.0.label: awkward orgy
LanguageData.VME_AwkwardOrgy.stages.0.description: Everyone sat around not knowing exactly what to do, naked bodies laying everywhere. Quite disappointing.
LanguageData.VME_SexyOrgy.stages.0.label: sexy orgy
LanguageData.VME_SexyOrgy.stages.0.description: We gave ourselves to each other in a communal expression of our deepest passions.
LanguageData.VME_ExhilaratingOrgy.stages.0.label: exhilarating orgy
LanguageData.VME_ExhilaratingOrgy.stages.0.descriptio: We all donned our high-society masquerade masks and got naked. A barrage of orgasmic sexual ecstasy unlike no other made our bodies tremble with barely concealed excitement.
LanguageData.VME_GotSomeLovin.stages.0.label: got some lovin'
LanguageData.VME_GotSomeLovin.stages.0.description: There's nothing like a tumble between the sheets to lift the mood.
